online

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • online.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    a server is used to play games on
    Author:
    Niek Tijink & thomas Kolner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(int port)
      makes a new server

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addClientName(java.lang.String msg, online.ClientHandler c)
      adds a name to the list of clientNames when a new clienthandler connects A clientName must be unique

      adds a handler to the list of handlers
      void broadcast(java.lang.String msg)
      used to broadcast a message to all clienthandlers connected to the serer

      used to broadcast a message to all players in a game
      java.util.ArrayList<online.ClientHandler> getHandler(Game game)
      gets all clienthandler playing in a game
      java.lang.String initiateHand(Player player)
      initiates a hand The player already has a hand (in the game of the server), but now the server sends the tiles in the hand to the client

      tries to open a serversocket

      sends (via broadcast) a message to all players

      removes a handler of the list of handlers
      void removeNames(java.lang.String[] names)
      removes some names from all waitingRooms and the lobby when a game is started
      java.lang.String requestGame(java.lang.String clientName, int choice)
      used when a clienthandler requests a game When a waitingroom is full, a new game is started otherwise the clienthandler is placed in the waitingroom

      While the server is running, it is waiting for clients to connect

      • requestGame

        public java.lang.String requestGame(java.lang.String clientName,
                           int choice)
        used when a clienthandler requests a game When a waitingroom is full, a new game is started otherwise the clienthandler is placed in the waitingroom
        Parameters:
        clientName - the name of the client
        choice - the number of players the client wants to play with
        Returns:

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(Game game,
            Player player,
            Player nextPlayer,
            java.lang.String completeMsg)
        sends (via broadcast) a message to all players
        Parameters:
        game - the game where the message needs to be send to
        player - the player that made the move
        nextPlayer - the player that now has to make a move
        completeMsg - the move

      • updateHand

        public void updateHand(Player player,
              java.lang.String msg)
        updates a hand after the player made a move
        Parameters:
        player - the player that made a move
        msg - the message send to the player

      • getHandler

        public java.util.ArrayList<online.ClientHandler> getHandler(Game game)
        gets all clienthandler playing in a game
        Parameters:
        game - the game
        Returns:
        a list with all clienthandlers in this game

      • initiateHand

        public java.lang.String initiateHand(Player player)
        initiates a hand The player already has a hand (in the game of the server), but now the server sends the tiles in the hand to the client
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:
        the message with the tiles

      • removeNames

        public void removeNames(java.lang.String[] names)
        removes some names from all waitingRooms and the lobby when a game is started
        Parameters:
        names - the names to be removed (thus starting a game with those names)

      • shutDownGame

        public void shutDownGame(Game game)
        shuts down a game Not implemented yet
        Parameters:
